name: Square Boy (Megarev)
description:
What if there was a game which combines platformer, reverse gravity, flappy style and projectiles into a one game. Well then you have Square Boy... with a twist, you don't have much control over which game genre is selected or even the projectiles. You'll be challenged against the moving screen. Good Luck and Enjoy!

Square Boy is a small implementation of a multi-genre game

Programs used for assets:

  • Piskelapp and Paint.NET - Art
  • SFXR and Chrome Music Lab - Music and Audio
  • Game Maker Studio - Game Engine

(Audio doesn't work for google chrome for some reason, For audio please download the executable below)

Thanks
